step_1_context.text: Yesterday we visited the museum, watched a film, and arrived home late.

step_2_explanation.simple_rule: Use past simple for completed actions at a finished time in the past.
step_2_explanation.common_mistake: Do not mix present and past markers in one clear past event.

step_3_interactive_exercises.question: Which sentence is correct in past simple?
options: We go to the market yesterday.
We went to the market yesterday.
We are going to the market yesterday.
We gone to the market yesterday.
step_3_interactive_exercises.correct_answer: We went to the market yesterday.

step_3_interactive_exercises.incorrect_sentence: Last night I watch a movie.
step_3_interactive_exercises.corrected_sentence: Last night I watched a movie.
step_3_interactive_exercises.error_analysis: A finished past time expression requires a past-tense verb.
